metadata.name: BEST BOAT
metadata.description:
The only ship you can truly steer in this ocean is the one you’re sailing. I’ve always wanted to sail around the world in a handmade boat, and I built a boat. This boat that we just built is just fine; And don’t try to tell us it’s not; The sides and the back are divine. After all, she stood in the storm, and when the wind did not blow her away, she adjusted her sails. But sometimes you need to tie up your boat to stop it from following your dreams.  
The heart of man is very much like the sea, it has its storms, it has its tides and in its depths, it has its pearls too. Peace is not found in a calmer storm, It’s found in a better 
boat.
